Alert @WG-prioritization/alerts instead of @WG-prioritization

files.patch:
@@ -79,7 +79,7 @@ exclude_labels = [

-@*WG-prioritization* issue #{number} has been requested for prioritization.
+@*WG-prioritization/alerts* issue #{number} has been requested for prioritization.
